title: The Hawk
subtitle: A runaway killer interrupts a couple of young kissing sessions.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: A couple ' s late-night beauty session is cut short when they hear a report on the car ' s radio about the runaway killer (who has a hook) in the vicinity. The girl insists that she be taken home immediately; when she arrives at her home, the boy discovers a bloody hook hanging from the passenger ' s doorknob.
